system.description: You bring back a dead creature in another body. The subject must have been dead no longer than one week. The new body is that of a creature of the same type (e.g. humanoid) determined by a table (e.g. bugbear, dwarf, elf, gnoll, gnome, goblin, half-elf, half-orc, halfling, human, kobold, lizardfolk, orc, troglodyte). The subject has 1 hit point and retains no levels or class abilities. The subject recalls the majority of its former life and form.

components.materialDescription: Rare oils and unguents worth at least 1,000 gp. Focus: a piece of the creature to be reincarnated.
